title: Command: "cargo doc --open" panics on 1.26.0-nightly
body:
`cargo doc --open` doesn't work on "my setup"

I expected to see this happen:

Generated doc is opened in browser.

Instead, this happened:

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

rustc 1.26.0-nightly (28a1e4ffe 2018-02-24)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 28a1e4ffefa2620ad9f4179ea339833448874fd3
commit-date: 2018-02-24
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.26.0-nightly
LLVM version: 6.0


Backtrace:

> $ env RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo doc --open
>  Documenting fui v0.8.0 (file:///home/xliiv/workspace/fui)
> thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', libcore/option.rs:335:21
> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.

> 
> note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
> 
> note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
> 
> note: rustc 1.26.0-nightly (28a1e4ffe 2018-02-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
> 
> error: Could not document `fui`.
> 
> Caused by:
>   process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --crate-name fui src/lib.rs -o /home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/doc -L dependency=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps --extern clap=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps/libclap-20bd25e71694d1b4.rlib --extern cursive=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps/libcursive-b9765bd4b9792b8c.rlib --extern glob=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps/libglob-792ad2f180cc8e04.rlib --extern regex=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps/libregex-991d00c8e5a333a3.rlib --extern serde_json=/home/xliiv/workspace/fui/target/debug/deps/libserde_json-f37b8535add2c12c.rlib` (exit code: 101)
